description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'addErrorMessage' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'addInfoMessage' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'addSuccessMessage' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Access: Method Spryker\Shared\ZedRequest\Client\AbstractHttpClient::getTransferFromResponse() accesses Spryker\Client\ZedRequest\Client\Response which violates rule "No call from Shared to Client"
Access: Method Spryker\Shared\ZedRequest\Client\AbstractHttpClient::getRequest() accesses Spryker\Client\ZedRequest\Client\Request which violates rule "No call from Shared to Client"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'setCurrencyIsoCode' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'setCurrentLocale' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
